vote.text: Amendment SA 134, under the order of 6/1/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 52. Record Vote Number: 143.

action.text: Amendment SA 134 proposed by Senator Budd. (consideration: CR S1889) To rescind unnecessary coronavirus funds.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 134 proposed by Senator Budd.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 134, under the order of 6/1/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 52. Record Vote Number: 143.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 134, under the order of 6/1/2023, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 52. Record Vote Number: 143.
